OOC: Just as a reference and the sake of clarity - the Ark is in
absolutely=
 no danger from this volcano. It is far enough away that the
soot will not =
be able to reach it, unless something totally unexpected
happenes. >:-)

Th=
e Jungle is located in what would now be South America (Think Amazon
Jungle=
) while the Ark would be in north America, Mount St. Hiliary.
(North of Ari=
zona or somewhere about)

I hope that helps to give an overall visual.

- P=
reston
